definition: don't blame (sb)
surname Xiu
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
bewildering/odd/strange/uncanny/devil/monster/to wonder at/to blame/quite/rather

sentences.english: Don't blame me for going to court since we can't settle it between us.
sentences.chinese: 我們之間的問題解決不了，休怪我到法院去起訴。

sentences.english: The fault of the ass must not be laid upon the packsaddle.

definition: to refuse a toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit/fig. to hesitate to do sth until forced to do even more
pinyin: jing4 jiu3 bu4 chi1 chi1 fa2 jiu3

unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating

stupid/stubborn/pigheaded
without meaning/nonsense/immoral/faithless
sensitive/tactful
evil creature (multipurpose curse)/evil domestic animal
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
